ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of DANIEL ROBERTO TUCCI of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 18, 2017.
